name: Iksula
tag_list: online-marketing, web-development, ecommerce, ecommerce-company, content-developed, web-content, drupal, php, ecommerce-expert, internet-retail, online-retail
overview:
Iksula is a services company offering strategic Outsourcing Solutions for the Direct to Consumer Industry. Iksula specializes in providing complete solutions for Internet and direct commerce companies globally.

Iksula derives its name from an ancient river in India. Iksula believes and aspires to grow and flow, serving the needs of direct commerce companies. Iksula is co-founded by ex-eBayites who have closely worked with Internet Retail, Online Travel and other direct commerce mediums.

Iksula provides Online/Web based Application Development that helps your organization and your clients to effectively manage projects, collaborate and share information. Our specialists work with you throughout the lifecycle of the project to determine best practices and requirements, ensuring rapid development, testing and implementation.

Location: B-702 Mangalya Bldg, Off. Marol maroshi Road, Marol, Andheri(East), Mumbai - 400059
